sql_query: SELECT T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_phone ,  T1.customer_email FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id GROUP BY T2.customer_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1
question: What is the name, phone number, and email address of the customer who has placed the most orders?
